languages.text: Янрис Данрок докладывает, что кибермастиф Глейто отказывается пускать офицеров в кают-компанию. Есть раненые. Высокий фактотум умоляет Лорд-капитана разрешить ситуацию.

Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.
languages.original_text: Янрис Данрок докладывает, что кибермастиф Глейто отказывается пускать офицеров в кают-компанию. Есть раненые. Высокий фактотум умоляет Лорд-капитана разрешить ситуацию.

traits.locale_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito is refusing to let officers into the wardroom. There are casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.
Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito is refusing to let officers into the wardroom. There are casualties. The High Factotum is ready to escort the Lord Captain to the officers' deck.

Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.
Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito is refusing to let officers into the wardroom. There are casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

languages.text: Janris Danrok meldet, dass der Cyber-Mastiff Glaito Offiziere am Betreten der Offiziersmesse gehindert und mehrere von ihren getötet hat. Das Hochfaktotum bittet den Lord Captain, sich der Sache anzunehmen.
languages.original_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

traits.locale_text: Janris Danrok meldet, dass der Cyber-Mastiff Glaito Offiziere am Betreten der Offiziersmesse gehindert und mehrere von ihren getötet hat. Das Hochfaktotum bittet den Lord Captain, sich der Sache anzunehmen.

languages.text: Janris Danrok rapporte que le cyber-mastiff Glaito interdit à ses hommes de pénétrer dans le carré des officiers, faisant par la même occasion plusieurs blessés. Le haut factotum supplie {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de résoudre le problème.
languages.original_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

traits.locale_text: Janris Danrok rapporte que le cyber-mastiff Glaito interdit à ses hommes de pénétrer dans le carré des officiers, faisant par la même occasion plusieurs blessés. Le haut factotum supplie {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de résoudre le problème.

languages.text: ジャンリス・ダンロックの報告によれば、サイバーマスチフのグライトが士官たちの士官室への立ち入りを妨害し、負傷者が多数出ているそうだ。ハイ・ファクトタムは、ロード・キャプテンにこの状況の解決を懇願している。
languages.original_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

traits.locale_text: ジャンリス・ダンロックの報告によれば、サイバーマスチフのグライトが士官たちの士官室への立ち入りを妨害し、負傷者が多数出ているそうだ。ハイ・ファクトタムは、ロード・キャプテンにこの状況の解決を懇願している。

languages.text: Janris Danrok informa de que el cibermastín Glaito está impidiendo la entrada a la sala de oficiales. Hay varios heridos. El Sumo Factótum ruega a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que resuelva la situación.
languages.original_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

traits.locale_text: Janris Danrok informa de que el cibermastín Glaito está impidiendo la entrada a la sala de oficiales. Hay varios heridos. El Sumo Factótum ruega a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que resuelva la situación.

languages.text: 根据詹里斯·丹罗克的报告，名为格雷托的生化獒犬禁止所有军官进入军官室，还造成了流血事件。高阶顾问请求行商浪人帮忙解决这个问题。
languages.original_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

traits.locale_text: 根据詹里斯·丹罗克的报告，名为格雷托的生化獒犬禁止所有军官进入军官室，还造成了流血事件。高阶顾问请求行商浪人帮忙解决这个问题。

languages.text: Janris Danrok, siber mastif Glaito'nun subayları subay salonuna sokmadığını ve bunun üzerine kayıplar verildiğini bildirdi. Arşıkâhya, durumu çözüme kavuşturması için Lord Kaptan'a yalvardı.
languages.original_text: Janris Danrok reports that cyber-mastiff Glaito has been preventing officers from entering the wardroom, leading to a number of casualties. The High Factotum begs the Lord Captain to resolve the situation.

traits.locale_text: Janris Danrok, siber mastif Glaito'nun subayları subay salonuna sokmadığını ve bunun üzerine kayıplar verildiğini bildirdi. Arşıkâhya, durumu çözüme kavuşturması için Lord Kaptan'a yalvardı.
